attributes.action: Award Blair Mayne (Colonel Paddy, founder of the SAS) a posthumous VC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blair Mayne was a founding member of the Special Air Service along with David Sterling. His bravery and acts of heroism were second to none and will never be seen again. Men have been awarded for lesser acts of bravery than this man, but still just as important. He is the most decorated soldier in our history and the Victoria Cross would give this soldier the recognition he deserves for his service to King & Country.

rejection.details: Unfortunatly we no longer deal with requests for posthumous awards.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
